name: TAI
description: Built on Ethereum, TAI protocol allows holders of ETH and LSDs to secure loans in the form of TAI, a collateral-backed, decentralized stablecoin. The TAI protocol supports a wide range of collateral, including ETH, wstETH, rETH, cbETH, and RAI, with more LSDs expected to be added. In addition to rewards, the TAI protocol will offer competitive interest rates for loans and lower than standard liquidation penalties for lenders.
